data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Pashchimi Singhbhum to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India

data.prayer: Father, help 300 new simple churches start among the 1,502,300 people in the county of Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 16,525 believers in Pashchimi Singhbhum to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kantabudia people. Make the Kantabudia people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 16,525 believers in the county of Pashchimi Singhbhum.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,485,775 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the county of Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,502,300.

We estimate Pashchimi Singhbhum has 16,525 people who might know Jesus, 18,228 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,467,547 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,467,547 who are far from you in Pashchimi Singhbhum, Jharkhand, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
